control_attributes.Control: CM-6 (1) AUTOMATED CENTRAL MANAGEMENT / APPLICATION / VERIFICATION
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to centrally manage, apply, and verify configuration settings for [Assignment: organization-defined information system components].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to support tracking of information system components by geographic location.
